column1: Local Foods////I've always seen this place but I never really knew what it was. Literally though it was a small quick grocery shopping place. Well
column2: finally came in after our doctor invited us here and recommended the "Crunch Chicken Sandwich." I took to yelp to see what the Yelp community had to say and lo and behold
column3: every one was talking about the Crunchy Chicken Sandwich. So I strolled in to the place already knowing what I was going to order. We came after lunch hour so it was a quick to order and very friendly staff. Place is very inviting and clean. As i said I had the crunchy chicken with a side of quinoa and kale with pine nuts and a Topo Chico to wash it all down. The sandwich I must say
